review.title: “JLodge”
review.pros: Pros – The Team Leads are very professional and extremely helpful
review.cons: Cons – Technical problems occur and sometimes take awhile to fix

review.title: “Not impressed”
review.pros: Pros – Helps people who are disabled get back to work.
review.cons: Cons – Only employs for about a year and lays the people off.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Let people know this is a Temporary Position.
